Metadata.Title: Log Entries Include Event Type
Metadata.Author: Serge Batchilo, Jason Taylor, Joe Basirico

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 10.3.2

What to Check For

Log entries should include event type.

How to Check

Examine the logs to verify that the log entries include event type information.

How to Fix

Please refer to the vendor's documentation or technical support for instructions on how to change the log output settings.

Related Items

  • Implement Audit Trails for System Components
